welcome.title: Welcome to Chronos

login.welcomeSubtitle: Manage your reminders with ease and never miss an important moment

login.alwaysOnTimeDesc: Get notified exactly when you need it
login.seamlessIntegrationDesc: Works with Discord and your favorite platforms
login.allTimezoneDesc: Schedule reminders no matter where you are in the world
login.mobileSubtitle: Sign in to manage your reminders
login.createAccountDesc: Join Chronos to start managing your reminders

discordSetup.usernamePlaceholder: Choose a username for the app
discordSetup.usernameHelper: This will be your app identity username. You can change it later.
discordSetup.tip: By setting up a password, you can log in using either your Discord account or your email address.
discordSetup.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters

details.title: Reminder Details

destinations.discordGuildDesc: Send to a Discord guild channel
destinations.webhookDesc: Send to a custom webhook URL

errors.dateTimeInPast: Date and time cannot be in the past
errors.selectFutureDateTime: Please select a future date and time

discord.selectGuildDescription: Choose the Discord server where you want to send reminders
discord.selectChannelDescription: Choose the channel for your reminders
discord.selectRoleDescription: Optionally select a role to mention in the reminder
discord.botNotInGuild: The bot is not in this server. Please invite the bot first to send reminders to this server.

reminderDetails.title: Reminder Details
reminderDetails.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder? This action cannot be undone.
reminderDetails.dateTimeInPast: Date and time cannot be in the past

vitrine.heroSubtitle: Chronos is your intelligent reminder assistant. Create, manage, and organize reminders across Discord and multiple platforms with timezone support.
vitrine.feature1: Smart reminder scheduling with natural language
vitrine.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to stay organized and on top of your schedule
vitrine.smartRemindersDesc: Set reminders with flexible scheduling and natural language support. Never forget important moments again.
vitrine.alwaysOnTimeDesc: Precise delivery of your reminders exactly when you need them, powered by reliable infrastructure.
vitrine.multiPlatformDesc: Receive reminders on Discord, via webhooks, email, and more. Choose your preferred notification method.
vitrine.timezoneDesc: Set reminders for any timezone. Perfect for teams and individuals spread across the globe.
vitrine.supportsSubtitle: Connect Chronos to your favorite platforms and receive reminders exactly how you want them
vitrine.discordDesc: Receive reminders directly in Discord channels or via DMs using advanced integration with the Discord bot
vitrine.slackDesc: Integrate with Slack for seamless team reminders
vitrine.webhookDesc: Send reminders to any custom webhook endpoint
vitrine.apiKeyDesc: Authenticate and manage all integrations via secure API keys
vitrine.apiKeyFeature1: Public API for integrating yourself the reminders
vitrine.emailComingSoonDesc: Email support is coming soon. Stay tuned!
vitrine.benefitsSubtitle: Join hundreds of users who trust Chronos for their important reminders
vitrine.benefit1Desc: Create reminders in seconds with our intuitive interface. No complicated setup required.
vitrine.benefit2Desc: Your reminders are safely stored and delivered with 99.9% reliability.
vitrine.benefit3Desc: We respect your privacy. Your data is encrypted and never shared with third parties.
vitrine.ctaSubtitle: Start managing your reminders today. It's free and takes less than a minute to get started.
vitrine.footerDesc: Your intelligent reminder assistant powered by advanced scheduling.
vitrine.worldClocksSubtitle: Time around the globe - Stay connected across timezones with Chronos

account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage your account settings and security preferences
account.appIdentityDesc: Manage your app password and account security
account.discordIdentityDesc: Connect or manage your Discord account
account.apiKeyIdentityDesc: Generate and manage API keys for programmatic access
account.passwordSameAsOld: New password must be different from current password
account.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
account.passwordChangedSuccessDesc: Your password has been changed. You can use your new password to log in.
account.timezoneUpdatedDesc: Your timezone has been updated and will be used for future reminders.
account.apiKeysDesc: Generate and manage API keys for programmatic access
account.deleteAccountWarningDesc: This action cannot be undone. All your reminders and account data will be permanently deleted.
account.deleteConfirmationDesc: Please type the word DELETE (in uppercase) to confirm you want to permanently delete your account.
account.accountDeletedDesc: Your account has been deleted. You are being logged out.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage API keys for programmatic access to your reminders
apiKeys.createDesc: Generate a new API key for third-party integrations
apiKeys.maxKeysReached: Maximum of 5 API keys per account
apiKeys.copyWarning: Copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
apiKeys.noKeysDesc: Create one to get started with the API
apiKeys.keyCreatedDesc: Keep it safe, you won't see it again!
apiKeys.keyRevokedDesc: The API key has been deleted
apiKeys.securityTip1: Never share your API keys publicly
apiKeys.securityTip2: API keys have read-only access to reminders
apiKeys.securityTip3: Revoke keys you no longer use
apiKeys.securityTip4: Store keys securely in your application
apiKeys.testGuideDesc: Learn how to test your API key with live examples
apiKeys.testStep1Desc: Select an API key from your list above and copy it
apiKeys.testStep2Desc: Select a programming language or tool to see the example
apiKeys.testStep3Desc: Replace YOUR_API_KEY with your actual key and run the command
apiKeys.liveTestDesc: Paste your API key below and test the actual API response.
apiKeys.importantNote1: Replace YOUR_API_KEY with your actual API key
apiKeys.importantNote2: API keys are read-only and support GET requests only
apiKeys.importantNote3: Keep your API keys secure and never share them publicly

verification.successDesc: Your email has been verified successfully!

contact.subtitle: Have a question, found a bug, or have a great idea? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.description: Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

contact.generalDesc: Ask a question or general inquiry

contact.sentSuccessfully: Message sent successfully! Thank you for reaching out.
contact.sendFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again later.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.passwordRequirements: Your password must be at least 8 characters long
resetPassword.youCanNowLogin: Your password has been successfully reset.
resetPassword.invalidLinkMessage: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.linkExpiredMessage: The password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long

selfHost.title: Self-Host Guide
selfHost.subtitle: Deploy and host your own instance of Chronos Reminder with complete control over your data and infrastructure.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Chronos Reminder is designed to be easily self-hostable using Docker containers. This guide will walk you through deploying all necessary components.
overview.backendDesc: API server with Discord bot integration
overview.frontendDesc: Modern web interface built with Vite

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: Chronos consists of multiple services working together:
architecture.backendDesc: Go-based API server handling reminders, authentication, and Discord bot functionality
architecture.postgresDesc: Primary data storage for users, reminders, and configurations. Migrations are handled automatically.
architecture.redisDesc: Session management, rate limiting, and caching layer
architecture.frontendDesc: React-based user interface served through Nginx

backend.title: Backend Deployment
backend.description: The backend container includes the API server and Discord bot in a single image.
backend.migrationNote: The backend automatically handles database migrations on startup. No manual migration steps required.

frontend.title: Frontend Deployment
frontend.description: The web interface can be deployed using the pre-built Docker image or rebuilt from source.

vars.discordRedirect: OAuth callback URL (must match Discord settings)

environment.title: Environment Variables
environment.description: Complete reference for all configuration options. Create a .env file with these variables.

vars.apiCors: CORS allowed origins (* for all, or comma-separated URLs)
vars.defaultTz: Default timezone ID for new users (16 = Europe/Paris)
vars.discordBotToken: Discord bot token from Discord Developer Portal
vars.redisPassword: Redis password (leave empty if no auth)
vars.jwtSecret: Secret key for JWT token signing (generate a secure random string)
vars.resendApiKey: Resend API key for email notifications (optional, for password reset)

database.title: Database Setup
database.description: Chronos requires PostgreSQL for data storage and Redis for caching. Both can be easily deployed with Docker.
database.postgresDesc: PostgreSQL 16 is recommended for optimal compatibility.
database.redisDesc: Redis is used for session management and rate limiting.
database.migrationDesc: The backend service automatically runs database migrations on startup. Simply ensure your PostgreSQL instance is running before starting the backend container.
database.dockerComposeDesc: For a complete deployment, use this docker-compose.yml configuration:
database.quickStartStep1: Create a .env file with all required variables
database.quickStartStep4: Access the web interface at http://localhost:3000

support.title: Need Help?
support.description: If you encounter any issues or have questions about self-hosting, we're here to help!
